channel.title: Comments on: LUG Template available on OpenNTF

item.title: By: IamLUG Information
item.dc:creator: IamLUG Information
item.description: <p>We just wanted to send a huge thanks to Matt and Warren from IamLUG for the amazing template. We have all put our own twists into it, but the real driving force and chief fixer of issues has been Matt. He did an awesome job, on his own time, in fixing any issues we encountered.</p><p>IamLUG team</p>
item.content:encoded:
We just wanted to send a huge thanks to Matt and Warren from IamLUG for the amazing template. We have all put our own twists into it, but the real driving force and chief fixer of issues has been Matt. He did an awesome job, on his own time, in fixing any issues we encountered.

IamLUG team

item.title: By: Mike McGarel
item.dc:creator: Mike McGarel
item.description: <p>A big "thank you" to you and Warren. I used this template for SkiLUG and would be glad to help where I can.</p>
item.content:encoded: A big "thank you" to you and Warren. I used this template for SkiLUG and would be glad to help where I can.

item.title: By: Mitch Cohen
item.dc:creator: Mitch Cohen
item.description: <p>Matt - thanks for all of the help with the template over the last couple of years for Tri State LUG, and for now making it more widely available via OpenNTF.</p><p>If I can help contribute some documentation I would be glad to help</p>
item.content:encoded:
Matt – thanks for all of the help with the template over the last couple of years for Tri State LUG, and for now making it more widely available via OpenNTF.

If I can help contribute some documentation I would be glad to help

item.title: By: Stuart McIntyre
item.dc:creator: Stuart McIntyre
item.description: <p>Thank you Matt and Warren. A great addition to the OpenNTF arsenal!</p><p>Happy to help with testing and some of the documentation. You wouldn't want my admin fingers on your lovely code!</p>
item.content:encoded:
Thank you Matt and Warren. A great addition to the OpenNTF arsenal!

Happy to help with testing and some of the documentation. You wouldn't want my admin fingers on your lovely code!

item.title: By: Serdar Basegmez
item.dc:creator: Serdar Basegmez
item.description: <p>Thanks a lot for this great database.</p><p>We used it for LUGTR 2011 conference and I am also wide open to any questions.</p>
item.content:encoded:
Thanks a lot for this great database.

We used it for LUGTR 2011 conference and I am also wide open to any questions.

item.title: By: Niklas Heidloff
item.dc:creator: Niklas Heidloff
item.description: <p>Thanks a lot. This is a great contribution to OpenNTF. I hope other new LUGs will actually use this and help extending.</p>
item.content:encoded: Thanks a lot. This is a great contribution to OpenNTF. I hope other new LUGs will actually use this and help extending.

item.title: By: Dennis van Remortel
item.dc:creator: Dennis van Remortel
item.description: <p>Guys</p><p>An awesome gesture to the community. Thanks all!!</p>
item.content:encoded:
Guys

An awesome gesture to the community. Thanks all!!
